programme.desc: A look back at UFC 211 from May 2017 in Dallas, Texas featuring the thrilling headline bout between Stipe Miocic and Junior Dos Santos.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC 318 at Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, featuring Dustin Poirier's retirement fight against old rival Max Holloway.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as the Asian Hawk, a top agent sent to retrieve the bronze heads of twelve animals of the Chinese Zodiac, stolen in Beijing in 1860.

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: Ordinary girl Bao meets troubled rich guy Edward. They conspire to ruin his father's remarriage and love blossoms. However, their romance takes an unexpected turn...

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, a drug lord and a police officer, are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle. After the younger brother's hidden identity as a drug lord is unveiled, an endless battle begins.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat stars as a retired gambling genius who is challenged to a high stakes game to elicit his kidnapped daughter's freedom.

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Two sworn brothers become enemies after the girl they love marries one of them. The rivalry is only resolved when the property owner of their shops wants to terminate their tenancies 40 years later.

programme.title: Go For Broke
programme.desc: With his family destroyed by drug dealers, Zhang Yao teams up with detective An to take down the drug lords. As the revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: An anthology of 3 horrifying tales; a singer spirals when spooky things happen in her home; a livestream ends with an influencer's death; the battle between residents & a creature in the stairwell.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: An average high-school girl, May is on a quest to win the love of her school heartthrob. However, May has a secret: she shoots electricity whenever she gets excited.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Headed by elite pilots, a special operations team is tasked to test new fighter jets. During test flights, the pilots face different difficulties and challenges, and try to push beyond their limits.

programme.title: Hong Kong Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee, a production head of an advertising firm, runs into her ex-boyfriend before a commercial shoot & drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong. She picks herself up with Chan's help.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a case where the body was undiscovered for 8 years. During the investigation, the prosecutor finds all inconsistencies & suspicions fall on Choi.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: The 1st Asian New Media FF's Best Actress Chrissie Chau reunites with Ekin Cheng in this story of three jilted men, who decide to invest in android girlfriends.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy Without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen fakes a pregnancy to keep her job when she finds out that she is about to be fired. She begins to feel guilty about her lie when she receives much care from her colleagues.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer gathers a team of thieves to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their plan alters upon finding the legendary 'Moonwatch', leading to a perilous heist amidst a yakuza pursuit.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Chow Yun Fat returns as the God of Gamblers, whose retirement plans go up in smoke when his protege seeks his help in apprehending a mastermind.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A traffic accident that resulted in a taxi driver being blinded inexplicably connects a group of unrelated people together, including blind masseurs from a massage center, a young man & a couple.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Nam and Fire are top racing drivers. Nam is depressed after causing a young racing driver's injury. Fire decides to compete in an illegal street car race to stand up for Nam. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: Those Were The Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: The highest grossing Chinese movie in Hong Kong history, the story tells of a barrister who swears to prove his client's innocence, going against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: When an engaged couple is requested to invite their parents for a CNY client event, the fiance - who is estranged from his mother, fakes a family. However, things spiral out of control.

programme.title: Marriage with a Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and Sean, who have been together for seven years, betray each other three days before their wedding. Faced with 'perfect' partners, they abandon their responsibilities and part ways.

programme.title: Caught In Time
programme.desc: Based on a string of real robberies and murder cases, a detective engages in a mouse-and-cat game with the 'Eagle Gang', a group of sophisticated, well-trained and ruthless robbers.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An accident at an offshore drilling platform results in the call for the Transportation Emergency Response Team to save the survivors before the site collapses.

programme.title: Teletubbies 11
programme.desc: Teletubbies stars iconic characters; Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. Familiar and beloved features from the original series return - The Noo-noo, Tubby Custard, Tubby Toast, Baby Sun, rabbits and the Voice Trumpets - along with some brand new surprises. Look out for th

programme.title: Work It Out Wombats! 13
programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. The goal is to make it to the e

There have been many serial killers throughout history, but none have inspired more fascination and fear than Jack the Ripper. Almost 140 years after the brutal slaying of his final victim, the mystery of his identity remains unsolved. Who was Jack the Ripper? And what compelled him to commit gruesome acts of murder?

All pets allowed!! Our fur babies. Our companions. Our extended members of the family. Most people look at us and think we are out of our minds for loving our pets so much. But with Pet Frenzy, you get to understand why our love for them runs so deep. You get to chat to us and see how we live with them day to day. programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.
Travelling through the of landscapes, towns and villages of Lancashire and Yorkshire, Robbie Cumming offers a personal take on life aboard his narrowboat, the Naughty Lass.

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.

programme.title: Al Jazeera News Live
programme.desc: Latest news headlines, current events, photos, and exclusive stories from eyewitnesses in Asia, Middle East, and Africa.

programme.desc: Journey across the pond to London for heartwarming adventures with beloved British bear Paddington in this CG-animated series, which centers on a younger Paddington as he writes letters to Aunt Lucy celebrating the new things he has discovered through the day's exciting activities.

CROSS COUNTRY CAKE OFF is an original competition series that celebrates the unbridled creativity of Canada's best cake-makers, and showcases the incredible stories of heart and humour that inspire them. Best friends on-screen and off, Billy Boyd and Dominic Monaghan, famed for portraying the lovable and mischievous hobbits in The Lord of the Rings trilogy, are embarking on a quest to eat the world. Theyll be travelling the globe to gain new insights into different countries unique culinary cultures, trying local cuisines, and getting up to plenty of shenanigans.

Our cooking teams will take turns each episode to transform an ordinary home into an instant restaurant for one pressure-cooker night. They'll be serving up a three-course menu designed to impress not only their fellow contestants, but also our series judges.
Tommy Walsh, Maxine Dwyer, and Asher Edwards visit viewers homes to solve problems in just 24 hours with their money-saving tips and transformations.

Farmer Wants A Wife returns for a 13th series with five new farmers joining the search for true love.
